QuestData.Title: The Lord of the Gordunni
QuestData.Description: Witch Lord Morkurk is the leader of the Gordunni. We need to kill him to secure the jovite for use in our artillery tower.$b$bMorkurk is an accomplished mage so you better be prepared. Here, take the rocket pack and use it if you need to avoid any of his deadly magic.$b$bArchenon poros!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Witch Lord Morkurk within Gordal Fortress.
QuestData.RewardText: Fine work commander! Your combat skills are clearly second to none. I am honored to be your armorer!$b$bLet's get back to the outpost so we can take stock of our new inventory. I saved a few flares to call us in a ride back.
